post.title: Chapters in the Codex
post.body: The Codex now contains entries for all chapters of the story. Information here shall be statistical information relating to that specific chapter, but also more detailed information -- which characters appear, interactions, most common words, word count, and the like.

comments.comment: The chapters are not appearing in order... Looks like the sort is treating the numbers as regular characters so 2 comes after 10, 11, 12 etc. =/
